nodes.text: This unidentified male was the mechanic of Doctor Cagaran Wei on the planet Nam Chorios.

During former Grand Master Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight Ben Skywalker and Sith Vestara Khai's investigation of Wei's disappearance, Luke had the Theran Listener Taselda speak with Wei's mechanic to get his landspeeder's backup memory to determine the places Wei's been to previously.
